content.prompt: By the 1790s the ideas of the Anti-Federalists contributed most directly to the

choices.label: abolition of the trans-Atlantic slave trade
continued use of property qualifications for voting in most states
resistance of western farmers to federal oversight

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification
